name: Watermelon and Blackberry Sangria
description: The definition of refreshing, this sangria works well for party since it's ready and prepped in the fridge.
recipeIngredient: 3 tablespoons fresh juice from about 3 limes
Garnish: 1 lime, sliced into thin circles

recipeInstructions.text: In a small saucepan, bring sugar and water to a boil. Stir until sugar is dissolved and remove from heat. Let cool to room temperature.
In a large pitcher, combine sugar syrup, lime juice, watermelon, blackberries, and sherry. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes and up to 3 hours.
Add lime slices to pitcher along with ice. Add seltzer and stir gently to combine. Serve immediately.
